bibl.title: The Tenants in the Vineyard. Ideology, Economics, and Agrarian Conflict in Jewish Palestine. (Wissenschaftliche Untersuchungen zum Neuen Testament .195.)
bibl.note: Portions of the book were presented as papers at various colloquia and seminars. - Introduction. - 1. Ideology and the Momentum of Interpretation. - 2. The Ideological Textures of the Parable of the Tenants in the Synoptics and Thomas. - 3. The Tenants as an Early Christian Allegory. - 4. Israel, the Temple, and the Fate of Jesus. - 5. The Parable as Realistic Fiction. - 6. Isaiah 5, 1-7, Egyptian Viticulture and Mark 12, 1.9. - 7. The Parable of the Tenants in Matthew and Luke. - 8. The Parable of the Tenants in Mark and Thomas. - 9. Reading Ancient Viticulture. - Epilogue. - Pp. 355-583: Appendix I. Dossier on Vineyard Leasing and Operations (III BCE - IV CE) [58 papyri, including several documents from the Zenon archive: text, translation, notes]; - Index to Appendix I; - 584-586: Appendix II.
